aquaculture.message1: How do I mine for fish?
aquaculture.message2: Doctor said I should start bottling up my feelings.
aquaculture.message3: Help I'm trapped in a Message In A Bottle making factory!
aquaculture.message4: My house was griefed, send supplies!
aquaculture.message5: Hey! Over here! I think I see you!
aquaculture.message8: Warning: Choking Hazard, keep out of reach of children.
aquaculture.message9: If you get this, this is you from the future, do NOT eat the porkchop.
aquaculture.message12: Neptunite is REAL, I tell you! I wasn't making it up!
aquaculture.message13: Enlarge your Fishing Rod for only 19.95 Gold! Guaranteed!
aquaculture.message14: What the hell is Fishallurgy? Some sort of reaction to fish?
aquaculture.message15: WHALE BURGERS! 2x Bread + Whale Steak! Remember those!?
aquaculture.message16: Ever since I came ashore things haven't been the same, because the moment I stepped onto the shore I totally lost the game..
aquaculture.message18: Oh I've got a lovely bunch of coconuts..
aquaculture.message19: I joined a tribe of cannibals to meat new people.
aquaculture.message21: Dear Shadowclaimer, add Unobtainium Hyper Diamonds that are invulnerable with instant mining speed tools and armor. Sincerely, Everyone.
aquaculture.message22: Dear Shadowclaimer, so when's 1.X coming out? Sincerely, Everyone.
aquaculture.message24: The tunaverse is truly an incredible place
aquaculture.message25: Null Pointer Exception: Aquaculture.MessageInABottle (String) cannot be null.
aquaculture.message26: I grind up diamond armor every morning and eat it for fast. - mDiyo
aquaculture.message27: -The message magically fades from your hand.-
aquaculture.message28: Look up at me, now back at your inventory, now back at me, this message is now DIAMONDS! Nah just kidding, its still paper.
